text: Eric Adrian Bauza (born December 7, 1979) is a Canadian-American voice actor, animator and comedian. His roles include Stimpy on Ren and Stimpy "Adult Party Cartoon", Rudolfo Rivera/White Pantera on El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera, Foop on The Fairly OddParents and Lord Stingray on Superjail!, The Powerpuff Girls. He is also one of the current voices of characters such as Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Marvin the Martian, Pep√© Le Pew, Tweety, Woody Woodpecker, Boo-Boo Bear, Ranger Smith, Scrappy Doo, and Dino. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Canadian animators Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Eric Bauza
